name: Silver Platter
description:
"So much easier than in real life". 

Dating isn't always easy in real life, that's why in Silver Platter it is!

This dating simulator is apart of the SA Game Jam 48h submission. 

Credits for Music:

Piano Ambience Relax by Coma-Media : https://pixabay.com/music/corporate-piano-ambience-relax-12447/

UI sounds by Zapsplat : https://www.zapsplat.com/music/ui-button-click-4/
